session_closed.description: Specifies the value `true` if the active session is closed as a result of the problem.

info.description: ### Service Overview The data service provides a Representational State Transfer (REST) Application Programming Interface (API) that enables you to add Mims data capabilities within your application. ### API Overview The Data Service provides the following endpoints: * `/status` - get the status of our services. ### API Usage The following information provides details about using the service to search the Mims database: * **HTTP REST interfaces:** You can use methods of the session-based, sessionless, or asynchronous HTTP interfaces to pass search data to the service. All interfaces let you send the data via the body of the request; the session-based and sessionless. * **Authentication:** You authenticate to the service by using your service credentials. You can use your credentials to obtain a token and contact the service directly. See Obtaining credentials for Mims services and Using tokens with Mims services.
info.title: API
